TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeNamespaceImportCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CodeNamespaceImportCollection class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespaceImport> objects.
## Examples The following example demonstrates some of the members of the CodeNamespaceImportCollection class. The example initializes a new instance of the class, adds <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespaceImport> objects to it, and gets the total number of objects in the collection.
[!code-cpp[CodeDomSampleBatch#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.codenam_1_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[CodeDomSampleBatch#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codenam_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[CodeDomSampleBatch#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codenam_1_1.cs)]
